Quote: Everybody has a secret world inside of them. I mean everybody. All of the people in the whole world, I mean everybody â€” no matter how dull and boring they are on the outside. Inside them they've all got unimaginable, magnificent, wonderful, stupid, amazing worlds... Not just one world. Hundreds of them. Thousands, maybe.
Author: Neil Gaiman,  The Sandman, Vol. 5: A Game of You
